channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Pentagon Adds Grok-Derived Products to Something Called the ‘AI Arsenal’
item.description: Take that, enemies of the United States.

item.title: The FCC’s foreign drone ban is here
item.description: The Federal Communications Commission has banned new drones made in foreign countries from being imported into the US unless the Department of Defense or the Department of Homeland Security recommends them. Monday's action added drones to the FCC's Covered List, qualifying foreign-made drones and drone parts, like those from DJI, as communications equipment representing "unacceptable […]...

item.title: This superfast 32-core AMD CPU costs under $140 with a 5-year warranty — but there's a big catch
item.description: AMD EPYC 7532 delivers 32 core server performance for a surprisingly low price, but there are some catches to be aware of.

item.title: Need a new colour ereader for the holiday season? I'd skip the Kindle Coloursoft and grab this discounted Kobo instead
item.description: The Kobo Libra Colour offers better value than the Kindle Colorsoft in Australia, and it's currently cheaper than its Amazon counterpart too.

item.title: The 60 Minutes report on CECOT that Bari Weiss censored is now internet contraband
item.description: Yesterday, Bari Weiss, the new editor-in-chief of CBS News, censored a segment of its newsmagazine 60 Minutes about men who had been deported to an El Salvador prison. Today, it's popping up online. 60 Minutes had already begun promoting the now-censored segment online. Because it was pulled so late, it seems that CBS missed at […]
